00138 class MimeTypeTable {

00140     public:
00150         class Partition {
00151

00154             public:
00156                 Partition(const MimeTypeTableEntry  table[], UINT  no_entries);
00157

00160 
00161             private:
00162                 const UINT                  m_no_entries;
00163                 const MimeTypeTableEntry *  m_table;
00164                 Partition *                 m_next_ptr;
00165 
00167                 Partition(const Partition &);
00168 
00170                 Partition&  operator=(const Partition &);
00171 
00172                 static BOOLEAN ListContainsString(const CHAR* str_list,
00173                                                   const CHAR* key_str,
00174                                                   UINT8& key_pos);
00175                 const MimeTypeTableEntry *   Begin() const { return &(m_table[0]); }
00176                 const MimeTypeTableEntry *   End() const { return &(m_table[m_no_entries]); }
00177                 const MimeTypeTableEntry &   At(UINT  index) const {
00178                     ASSERT_DEBUG(index < m_no_entries);
00179                     return  m_table[index];
00180                 }
00181                 BOOLEAN HasNext() const { return m_next_ptr != 0; }
00182                 const Partition* GetNext() const { return  m_next_ptr; }
00183                 Partition* GetNext() { return  m_next_ptr; }
00184                 void SetNext(Partition* next_ptr) { m_next_ptr = next_ptr; }
00185                 const MimeTypeTableEntry &  FindByMimeTypeId(MimeType id) const;
00186                 const MimeTypeTableEntry &  FindByMimeString(const CHAR* mime_str) const;
00187                 const MimeTypeTableEntry &  FindByExtension(const CHAR* file_ext, UINT8 &idx) const;
00188         };
